TextView.android:text: Body weight is a measure of your body's weight.

Body mass index or BMI, is a ratio of weight to height used to broadly define a 'healthy weight'. A BMI of 25 is considered healthy, while a BMI of less than 15 is considered underweight and a BMI of greater than 25 is considered overweight.
Body height is a measure of your body's height.
Body temperature is a measure of your body's temperature. 98.6 degrees Farenheit is considered average.
My current Diastolic blood pressure is:
My current Systolic blood pressure is:
Heart rate is a count of heart beats per minute. Resting heart rates vary by age, but can be an indicator of good heart health. For your age, a rate of X is considered healthy.
